thought: The website is accessible. Next, I should extract text from the website to look for any of the common characteristics of scam websites, such as unusually low prices, unrealistic monetary claims, psychological targeting, or unclear privacy information.
observation: Johnson Monument: Chippewa Falls Headstones, Gravestones & Tombstones  Skip to content Johnson Monument | Memorials | Chippewa Falls, WI Cremation Products Pet Memorials Contact FREE Virtual Consult 715-723-5576 Markers ALL Markers Cemetery grave markers for one to four graves Flat Granite Markers Bronze Markers Raised Markers Related Resources Customization Granite Colors Request a Brochure ALL RESOURCES Monuments Beautiful upright cemetery monuments for your beloved family members. Single Grave Monuments Two Grave Monuments Family Monuments Benches Mausoleums Mausoleums Overview The ultimate option for those wishing to leave a lasting family legacy. Mausoleum Gallery How Mausoleums Are Designed & Built Order a Mausoleum Veterans & Community specific All Veterans & Community Projects Lasting tributes to honor those in your community. Veterans Memorials Bronze Plaques Community Projects Signage Services All Services Professional services to keep your memorial looking as beautiful as the day it was purchased. Cleaning Cemetery Lettering Maintenance Other Services Resources X Veterans Markers Cemetery Guidelines Epitaphs for Headstones How to Order Things to know before buying a headstone The Headstone Purchasing Process FAQ Special Offers Toggle navigation Search Memorials as unique as the loved ones they honor Flat VIEW DETAILS Raised Upright Private Since 1917, families have trusted Johnson Monument Company to create timeless tributes to honor their loved ones. Our expert staff and talented craftsmen will design and carve your memorial with the time and attention it deserves. ABOUT US Public Works Did you know Johnson Monument is also active in the public sector?  We have partnered with many municipalities, veterans’ organizations, colleges, churches, forest preserves, and park districts to provide commemorative and donor recognition pieces.  Visit our galleries to see just a few examples of our work. VIEW ALL A video is being shown Close modal window Here to Guide You Every Step of the Way We understand that most people have never purchased a headstone before and are unsure where to begin.  Our memorial specialists will guide you through the granite selection and design process and will coordinate the carving, delivery, and installation of your memorial at the cemetery.  They will be your single point of contact, making the process simple and convenient.  For an overview of the headstone purchasing process, watch the short video below. Customization & Pricing In-Cemetery Services Services such as adding information to an existing memorial as well as cleaning and maintenance are performed on-site in the cemetery.  Check out the services links below to learn more. Onsite Engraving View All Previous Next Adding an inscription to an existing memorial, like a name or date of death, can be done right in the cemetery. LEARN MORE Restore your memorial to it's original beauty by having it professionally cleaned or refinished. Memorial maintenance such as leveling, straightening and resealing, are just a few of the services our expert staff can provide. 1 2 3 Testimonials "Everything was beautiful.  I will be referring family friends and spreading the word.  Wonderful!!!" L. Hiller, "We saw the memorial this past weekend and could not be more pleased.  Thank you for a job well done!" W. & C. Wilder, "Just a few words of extended thanks for the marvelous service, warm expression of kindness and patience. I knew I would be pleased, but my daughter's memorial is much more beautiful than I imagined. Now when I visit my daughter's memorial, I receive a little more comfort and peace." S. Patterson, "The headstone is absolutely beautiful.  Our late mom would've loved it." D. Herr, "We absolutely loved the headstone and got it way sooner than we thought." D. Brockert, "During our time of sadness, you were helpful and kind." K. Kampa, "Beautiful work, exactly as ordered." K. Dee, "It was beautiful.  My family and I love it. Thank you so much." B. Minor, We Are Here to Help We’re here to help you with this emotional and unfamiliar purchase. Stop in at any of our locations phone email Get An Estimate Serving the Chippewa Valley for 100 years. Call or click Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy ©2024 Johnson Monument About Careers Return Policy Johnson Monument, LLC CONNECT YouTube Facebook © 2024 Troost Monument Company Glantz. Request Information Please Fill Out The Form Below to receive a quote. Design ID * If you'd like to add multiple ids please use comas between numbers. Full Name Email Phone Address Street Address Address Line 2 City State / Province / Region ZIP / Postal Code Country Afghanistan Albania Cemetery Name Cemetery City Select Alabama Alaska Message CAPTCHA This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. This website uses cookies to improve your experience. We'll assume you're ok with this, but you can opt-out if you wish. Cookie settings ACCEPT Privacy & Cookies Policy Close Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these cookies, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities... Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensures basic functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not store any personal information. Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads, other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory to procure user consent prior to running these cookies on your website. SAVE & ACCEPT Notifications

thought: The extracted text does not indicate unusually low prices or unrealistic monetary claims. It appears to be a business site that offers products and services related to memorials, such as headstones and mausoleums. There are also testimonials that seem genuine and an emphasis on customer service. The site has a privacy policy and mentions cookies, which is a good sign. However, I still need to verify the authenticity of the business and the website.

thought: The WHOIS information for johnsonmonument.com shows that the domain is legitimately registered and has been in existence since 2001. This longevity is typically a good sign and not common among scam websites, which often have a short lifespan. The domain has privacy protection, which is not unusual, but it prevents us from seeing the actual registrant's details. The domain is set to expire in 2033, which shows a commitment to maintaining the domain long-term. Let's now check for any online reputation or reports of scams related to this website to further verify its legitimacy.

thought: Based on the WHOIS information showing a long-standing domain registration, the nature of the business which is consistent with the products and services offered, the presence of the business on reputable sites like Yelp, and the absence of scam-related search results, I am inclined to conclude that johnsonmonument.com is not a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has been registered since 2001 indicating a long-standing online presence. The content of the website is consistent with its purported business of creating memorials and gravestones. There were no indicators of unusually low prices unrealistic monetary claims or psychological manipulation. The website has a privacy policy and does not exhibit any of the common characteristics of scam websites.
